content.question: A perfectly competitive market produces the socially efficient level of output when the marginal social benefit of the last unit of output produced is

choices.label: equal to the marginal social cost
less than the marginal social cost
greater than the total producer surplus
equal to the total producer surplus

content.answer: equal to the marginal social cost

topic.text: 6.1: Socially Efficient and Inefficient Market Outcomes
